function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Automation failure in data collection leading to inaccurate time values","Impact":"Misrepresentation of system efficiency and capacity, potential delay in decision-making","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of digital technology, manual verification of data","Technologies":"Digital data collection and analysis tools, regular software updates","People":"Planners, decision makers","Owner":"IT department, data analysts"},{"Description":"Inadequate mapping of the real process due to incomplete or unreliable data","Impact":"Inefficient system adjustments, suboptimal scenario testing, potential system failures","Mitigation":"Cross-verification of data from multiple sources, continuous improvement of data collection methods","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, sensor technology","People":"Planners, system analysts","Owner":"IT department, process improvement team"},{"Description":"Resource overutilization leading to employee burnout and dissatisfaction","Impact":"Reduced employee productivity, increased staff turnover, negative impact on patient care","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of resource utilization, workload balancing, employee feedback mechanisms","Technologies":"Workload management software, employee feedback platforms","People":"Employee supervisors, human resources","Owner":"Department managers, human resources"}]}
